==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=温里药|t2=溫裏藥}}

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=wēnlǐyào
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# Interior-warming ''[[w:Materia medica|materia medica]]'' in [[traditional Chinese medicine]]. This term refers to herbs and other medicinal substances that are used to warm the interior organs (such as the lungs and stomach) of the body.

====Hyponyms====
{{rel-top|hyponyms}}
* {{zh-l|丁香|flower of {{taxlink|Eugenia caryophyllata|species|noshow=1}}}}
* {{zh-l|吳茱萸|fruit of ''[[Euodia]]''}}
* {{zh-l|肉桂|bark of the [[cinnamon]]}}
* {{zh-l|小茴香|fruit of the ''[[Foeniculum]]''}}
* {{zh-l|細辛|''[[Asarum]]'' plant}}
* {{zh-l|花椒|pericarp of the ''[[Zanthoxylum]]''}}
* {{zh-l|川烏頭|root of the ''[[Aconitum]]''}}
* {{zh-l|草烏頭|root of the {{taxlink|Aconitum kusnezoffii|species|noshow=1}}}}
* {{zh-l|高莨薑|rhizome of the {{taxlink|Alpinia officinarum|species|noshow=1}}}}
* {{zh-l|乾薑|rhizome of the ''[[Zingiber]]''}}
* {{zh-l|附子|prepared root of the {{taxlink|Aconitum lateralis|species|noshow=1}}}}
* {{zh-l|蓽茇}}
